remarks: Lemma for ~ pexmidN .  (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pexmidlem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
pexmidlem.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
pexmidlem.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pexmidlem.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
pexmidlem.o $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
pexmidlem.m $e |- M = ( X .+ { p } ) $.
pexmidlem6N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A /\ p e. A ) /\ ( ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = X /\ X =/= (/) /\ -. p e. ( X .+ ( ._|_ ` X ) ) ) ) -> M = X ) $.
